chapter.name: Quintet.net: Installation
chapter.p: Download or clone the GitHub repo from https://github.com/HfMT-ZM4/Quintet.net/ to your Max 8/Packages folder (the Max 8 folder is typically located in ~/Documents).

p.i: In addition, Quintet.net requires the following Max packages:

chapter.p: MaxScore is the notation environment necessary to display scores and real-time notation Get from http://www.computermusicnotation.com/downloadmaxscore/.
Download the most recent GitHub repo from https://github.com/CNMAT/CNMAT-odot/releases to your Max 8/Packages folder
Quintet.net and MaxScore also require the installation of the Java SDK which you can find here for your operation system.
In Max, use the Package Manager to download the zero package. This will enable the zeroconf protocol, useful in local network performance.
